definition: to prepare herbal medicine by roasting or parching (in a pan)
to sauté/to fry/to dry by heating
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]
to bombard/to bomb/(fig.) to criticize/to roast
to concoct/to invent/to fabricate/to produce/to process/processing and curing (Chinese medicine)

sentences.english: Two soldiers dismounted the gun from the base.
sentences.chinese: 兩個戰士把炮從底座上卸下來。

sentences.english: Photon Cannons, or the little hand thingies.
sentences.chinese: 光子炮，便是那個小手一律澳門新澳門賭場東西。

sentences.english: Do you know what a Dijon Culverin is?
sentences.chinese: 你知道什麼是第戎長炮嗎？

sentences.english: The anti-aircraft guns riddled the plane's wings with bullets.
sentences.chinese: 防空炮把機翼打得彈痕累累。

sentences.english: This time, it was Melky Cabrera's shot that tied it for New York.
sentences.chinese: 這一次，是牛奶爲洋基打出追平比數的陽春炮。

sentences.english: The acute toxicity and anti-inflammatory effect of processed and raw Gamboge were compared.
sentences.chinese: 比較藤黃生品及其炮製品的急性毒性和抗炎作用。

sentences.english: This paper presents a way of software integration of VXI measure control system.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了電熱化學炮VXI測控系統的集成技術。

sentences.english: The result shows no remarkable difference between the raw and processed products.
sentences.chinese: 鹿鞭與其炮製品的多數成分無明顯差片。

sentences.english: Let's see you avoid a blast from my Synchro Cannon.
sentences.chinese: 讓我看看你們能不能逃過我的同步炮的轟擊。

sentences.english: For their part, railguns have been around for nearly a century.
sentences.chinese: 對於他們來說，軌道炮一個世紀以來早已深入人心。

sentences.english: Synchro Cannons on line and ready to fire.
sentences.chinese: 同步炮連接能源，準備開火。

sentences.english: Brower, the grandson, still uses a heavy brass harpoon gun stamped as having been made in a very different whaling capital, New Bedford, Mass.
sentences.chinese: 這位孫子布羅爾先生還在用一根笨重的銅製捕鯨炮。

sentences.english: Ion cannon shots vaporise the object struck magnifying the energy discharge.
sentences.chinese: 離子炮射擊能使目標蒸發從而增大能量發射。

sentences.english: Type 11 had been replaced with Type 92 Infantry Gun.
sentences.chinese: 後被九二式步兵炮取代。

sentences.english: Methods:Using TLC to identify Radix Rehmanniae and its Preparata.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用薄層色譜方法鑑別地黃及加工炮製品。

definition: big gun/cannon/artillery/one who talks big/trad. form 大炮 also used/CL:門|门[men2],尊[zun1]
